
\if 0
\setupreferencing[
  %state	start stop
  %sectionnumber=yes,	%yes no
  %prefix	+ - text
  %interaction	label text all symbol
  %width	dimension
  left=,	%command	\about 默認會被“”包起來，此處移除雙引號
  right=,	%command
  %convertfile	yes no small big
  %separator	text
  %autofile	yes no page
  %global	yes no
]
\fi

\define[1]\refchapter{%
\in{Chapter}{}[chapter:#1]%
}

\define[1]\refappendix{%
\in{Appendix}{}[appendix:#1]%
}

\define[1]\refappendixsec{%
\in{Appendix}{}[sec:#1]%
}

\define[1]\refsection{%
\in{Section}{}[section:#1]%
}

\define[1]\refitem{%
\in{Item}{}[item:#1]%
}

\define[1]\reffig{%
\in{Figure}{}[fig:#1]%
}
\define[1]\reftab{%
\in{Table}{}[tab:#1]%
}
